MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm due to work needed to remove trees from the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:27pm on 14th January 2021
